    • Field Detail

      • busID

        public java.lang.String busID
        The ID of the bus. While typically this is a number, on the rare occasion it can also be a name. As such, it should just be stored as a string. If this needs to be a number try parsing it from the string.

      • latitude

        public double latitude
        The latitude and longitude of the bus. Essentially making up its respective coordinates. This is stored as a double as latitude and longitude values are floating points numbers.

      • longitude

        public double longitude
        The latitude and longitude of the bus. Essentially making up its respective coordinates. This is stored as a double as latitude and longitude values are floating points numbers.

      • color

        public int color
        The current bus's color. This is more representative of the route its on (ie what is its route color), and thus is optional.

        This is an int instead of a Color object because for whatever reason android stores its colors as ints.

      • route

        public Route route
        The bus's corresponding route.

      • heading

        public java.lang.String heading
        String used to store the buses current heading. This is optional, and may just be an empty string as a result.

      • currentCapacity

        public int currentCapacity
        Variables to store the current bus capacity, as well as the speed in mph.

      • speed

        public int speed
        Variables to store the current bus capacity, as well as the speed in mph.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Bus

        public Bus(java.lang.String busID,
           Route route)
        Construction for the bus. Only the bus's ID and its corresponding route are required.
        Parameters:
        busID - The ID belonging to the bus.
        route - The bus's route.

    • Method Detail

      • getBuses

        public static Bus[] getBuses(Route route)
                      throws org.json.JSONException
        Gets the buses from the provided route.
        Parameters:
        route - The route to get the buses from.
        Returns:
        The array of buses that coorespond to the provided route.
        Throws:
        Thrown - if there is an exception when parsing the JSON corresponding to the bus.
        org.json.JSONException

      • drawBuses

        public static void drawBuses(Route[] routes,
                             com.google.android.gms.maps.GoogleMap map)
        Draws the buses of the provided routes to the provided map.
        Parameters:
        routes - The routes that the buses correspond to.
        map - The map to have the buses drawn on.
